Package simpopulation

Class PopulationEvent<T extends Organism<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulation.Event
      • simpopulation.PopulationEvent<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Event>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Death, Mutation, Reproduction
    public abstract class PopulationEvent<T extends Organism<T>>
extends Event
    Abstract class which defines an event that will occur to a specific specimen of a population It should be extended to define a specific event, with an associated effect.
    Author:
    group16
